Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication

comment: "Magazine pays $250 for online content -- whether its off-the-cuff opinion or heavily reported enterprise or front-line news on tight deadline. At least one editor has been known to deny payment to a young writer after story ran. They'll admit they're slow to pay -- can take two months -- and can take some haranguing. "
